author: USA TODAY, Erin Jensen, USA TODAY
title: 'Small wins!': Amanda Kloots celebrates husband Nick Cordero's progress amid COVID-19 fight
description: Amanda Kloots is all about celebrating the small victories, as her husband, Broadway actor Nick Cordero, is in the ICU with coronavirus.
content:
"Good Morning America" anchor George Stephanopoulos revealed on the show that he tested positive for COVID-19, after taking care of his sick wife.
